page.title: 20BUILTH'S FAMOUS STATUE
page.content:
{(CONTINUED) The statue is made mostly of concrete and has been sculpted by a local artist named Bernard Jones. He has had to come back a couple of times to repair and clean up his statue. I must admit,I don't like the sculpture very much myself and I'm sure a lot of people would agree with me, but I still think it's a pity that people can take a hammer and chisel to it and cover it with paint.
BUILTH C.P.SCHOOL'S CONTRIBUTION TO THE DOMESDAY PROJECT COMPILED BY: {ANDREW JONES ) {SIMONE GARNETT ) ALL OF JUNIOR CLASS {REBECCA SAMUEL ) FOUR,OCTOBER,1985. {TRUDY MORGAN ) {LINDA JONES ) {
